content: **azalea batwing sweater** ======================================= the ultimate in coziness and comfort the azalea batwing sweater is a perfect transitional piece the sweater is comfy enough to wear relaxing at home yet stylish enough for out and about created from 2 identical front and back panels the sweater is worked from the bottom up and features a striking braided puff feature at the top the pattern is written for 9 sizes from xs - 5x **sizing** this sweater is designed with 0-2 25 / 0-5 5cm of positive ease at the hips measured at the widest point the nature of the batwing shape at the sleeves means that the bust will naturally be quite loose - this is why the sizes are based on hip measurement the pdf includes a detailed schematic and a stitch tutorial for the braided puff section **yarn requirements** any #3/dk/light weight yarn xs 1650 yds / 1510m s 1750 yds / 1600m m 1900 yds / 1737m l 2000 yds / 1829m xl 2050 yds / 1875m 2x 2150 yds / 1966m 3x 2250 yds / 2057m 4x 2350 yds / 2149m 5x 2400 yds / 2195m **pattern support** as with all my patterns i am more than happy to offer any help and support that i can -
